name: Modular Japanese House Demo
description:
Demo level for the Modular Japanese Town House (MJH) pack for UE4. 

With this demo you can walk around a little machiya town, go inside the houses and change the time of the day.

The demo is built using the assets from MJH pack. Almost all assets here are from the pack, with few exceptions: the landscape, vegetation, audio and some props are not included in the pack. 

The MJH pack is already submitted to the Marketplace, but is still in "pending approval" state. You can follow our twitter (@games_inu) or our website (inu-games.com) to be notified when it's out.

Music by Sei Mutsuki,  http://peritune.com/, Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 International License.
